thread.title: Will this hunk be the next Bachelor?
thread.title_full: Will this hunk be the next Bachelor?

title: Will this hunk be the next Bachelor?
text:
Who should be the next Bachelor: Michael or Richie? Alison Stephenson and Charlotte Willis news.com.au Who should be the next Bachelor: Michael or Richie? Alison Stephenson and Charlotte Willis news.com.au Alex Cameron, Richie Strahan and Michael Turnbull the three runner up Bachelorette men. 
THE credits have only just rolled on the first ever season of The Bachelorette Australia and already fans are in a frenzy over who should be the gentleman to step into the Bachelor’s shoes next year. 
Thirteen men were left in Sam Frost’s wake after gifting the final rose to Sacha Mielczarek on Thursday night, leaving a baker’s dozen of prospective Bachelors to choose from. 
First and second runners-up Michael Turnbull and Richie Strahan are obvious choices and favourites for the role after winning hearts across the country and enough interest from Sam Frost to keep them around until the end. Michael looks as good with his clothes off and he does with them on. Michael Turnbull, former soccer player and professional charmer. Richie is still single and says he’d “consider” signing up for The Bachelor in 2016. Richie Strahan, hellooo.
